channel.title: Adding moreinfo files to your server
channel.description:
Hey,
Tokens REALLY annoy me and i've given up on trying (lol) so i'll be paying 300K RS2 GP for someone to make me a moreinfo code.
Needs to have:
Read from moreinfo file (I.E. if membership = 1 in the moreinfo file of the player, you can use it in cases like if(membership == 1). Save to moreinfo file from ints in the client.java ("I.E. if public int membership = 5; then it saves membership to 5 in the moreinfo file when it saves file. Creates a new moreinfo file for the character if they don't have one (AKA First log on)
I did pay LescapePK and he kind of, well, "took the money and didn't do the job for me".
Thanks :)

item.title: Adding moreinfo files to your server
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

aight… well declare the int, add

} else if (token.equals("NAMEOFTOKEN")) { NAMEOFTOKEN = Integer.parseInt(token2);

add

characterfile.write("NAMEOFTOKEN = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(NAMEOFTOKEN), 0, Integer.toString(NAMEOFTOKEN).length()); characterfile.newLine();

and say like if(NAMEOFTOKEN == int) I guess, really idk.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding moreinfo files to your server

item.title: Adding moreinfo files to your server
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Hey,

Tokens REALLY annoy me and i’ve given up on trying (lol) so i’ll be paying 300K RS2 GP for someone to make me a moreinfo code.

Needs to have:

Read from moreinfo file (I.E. if membership = 1 in the moreinfo file of the player, you can use it in cases like if(membership == 1).
Save to moreinfo file from ints in the client.java ("I.E. if public int membership = 5; then it saves membership to 5 in the moreinfo file when it saves file.
Creates a new moreinfo file for the character if they don’t have one (AKA First log on)

I did pay LescapePK and he kind of, well, “took the money and didn’t do the job for me”.

Thanks
